name: Validate Booking Service Health Check
scenario: Positive scenario to validate the health check of the Booking Service API.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Send a GET request to the Booking Service health check endpoint (/health). 2. Capture the response code. 3. Verify that the response code is 200.
expected_result: Response code is 200, indicating the Booking Service is available and functioning correctly.

name: Validate Payment Service Health Check
scenario: Positive scenario to validate the health check of the Payment Service API.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Send a GET request to the Payment Service health check endpoint (/health). 2. Capture the response code. 3. Verify that the response code is 200.
expected_result: Response code is 200, indicating the Payment Service is available and functioning correctly.

name: Validate Check-in Service Health Check
scenario: Positive scenario to validate the health check of the Check-in Service API.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Send a GET request to the Check-in Service health check endpoint (/health). 2. Capture the response code. 3. Verify that the response code is 200.
expected_result: Response code is 200, indicating the Check-in Service is available and functioning correctly.

name: Validate Booking Service Health Check Failure
scenario: Negative scenario to validate the health check of the Booking Service API when it is down.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Simulate a failure in the Booking Service. 2. Send a GET request to the Booking Service health check endpoint (/health). 3. Capture the response code.
expected_result: Response code is not 200, indicating the Booking Service is unavailable or not functioning correctly.
